ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisRe-appointment of IAN SCOTT of Chelsea, Quebec, as a full-time member and Chairperson of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four months, effective September 5, 2022.
